exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a : R x, l : Rbar Hlim : is_lim (fun y : R => a * f y) x (Rbar_mult a l) Unable to unify "is_lim (fun y : R => a * f y) x (Rbar_mult a l)" with "is_lim (fun y : R => f y * a) x (Rbar_mult l a)".

original: intros Hlim. apply is_lim_scal_l with (a:=a) in Hlim. apply Hlim.
